item.title: Projects
item.description: Title: Covid'19: Social Distancing and Drones Description of project : The pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID19) is spreading all overthe world. The recently emerging Artiﬁcial intelligence (AI) technologies. For example, AI-empowered image acquisition can signiﬁcantly help automate the social distancing and contact tracing. In this project, we thus cover the entire pipeline of imaging and Drones techniques to prevent peoples to disobey social distancing with the help of CCTV video stream and Drones.

item.title: Covid'19: Social Distancing and Drones
item.description: Abstract:The pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID19) is spreading all over the world. ImagingsuchasCCTV,and mobile images plays an essential role in the global ﬁght against COVID-19,whereastherecentlyemergingartiﬁcialintelligence (AI) technologies further strengthen the power of the imaging tools and help medical specialists. We hereby review the rapid responses in the community of medical imaging (empowered by AI) toward COVID-19. For example, AI-empowered image acquisitioncansigniﬁcantlyhelpautomatethesocialdistancing and contact tracing, also reshape the workﬂow with minimal contacttopatients,providingthebestresult.
